summary: 1998 CORVETTE STEERING COLUMN LOCKED UP. THIS PROBLEM HAS HAPPENED TO SO MANY PEOPLE THAT I THINK SOMETHING SHOULD BE DONE ABOUT IT. I HAD TO PAY $700 DOLLARS OUT OF MY POCKET TO GET THIS PROBLEM FIXED. IF AND WHEN THEIR IS A LAWSUIT I HOPE TO BE INVOLVED. THANK YOU, [XXX].   *NLM  REF.
